        public java.sql.ResultSet get(int timeTableId)
        Get all the books in the right timetable
        Parameters:

      • get

        public java.sql.ResultSet get(int timeTableId,
                              int bookId)
        Get all the books in the right timetable and with the right id (there should never be more than one)
        Parameters:
        timeTableId - Id of the timetable of which we want to retrieve a book
        bookId - Id of the book we want to retrieve
        Returns:
        All the books with the right id

      • create

        public java.lang.Boolean create(int timeTableId,
                                int bookingId,
                                java.lang.String login,
                                java.util.Date dateBegin,
                                java.util.Date dateEnd,
                                int roomId)
        Create a new Book in the database
        Parameters:
        timeTableId - Id of the timetable of the new book
        bookingId - Id of the new book
        login - Login of the teacher of the new book
        dateBegin - Beginning date of the new book
        dateEnd - Ending date of the new book
        roomId - Id of the room of the new book
        Returns:
        Has the book been successfully created ?

        Parameters:

      • exist

        public java.lang.Boolean exist(int timeTableId,
                               int bookId,
                               java.lang.Boolean default_value)
        Check if there is a book with the right id and the right timetable
        Parameters:
        timeTableId - Id of the timetable that the book we want to find must have
        bookId - Id that the book we want to find must have
        default_value - Value to return is there is an issue
        Returns:
        Does this book exist ?

      • exist

        public java.lang.Boolean exist(int timeTableId,
                               int bookId,
                               java.lang.String login,
                               java.util.Date dateBegin,
                               java.util.Date dateEnd,
                               int roomId,
                               java.lang.Boolean default_value)
        Check if there is a book which match all the conditions
        Parameters:
        timeTableId - Id of the timetable that the book we want to find must have
        bookId - Id that the book we want to find must have
        login - Login that the book we want to find must have
        dateBegin - Beginning date that the book we want to find must have
        dateEnd - Ending date that the book we want to find must have
        roomId - Id of the room that the book we want to find must have
        default_value - Value to return is there is an issue
        Returns:
        Does this book exist ?
